Why in the name of God do people upload this boring interview version of Senna 2010. 

The exciting version is the shorter 104 minute version that doesn't include the boring interviews. Can someone please upload a 1080p of the exciting version instead of this boring one?

Agreed, can someone PLEASE upload a 720P/1080P BluRay rip of the 104min theatrical release.  It's a far superior piece of film.  I saw it at the cinemas twice and would like to show a friend before I give him the longer one.

As a brazilian and fan of Ayrton Senna I like this one...I confess there is too much interviews but in the end it is quite good! I still watch formule 1 but it has not been the same since ages, too much tecnology spoiled the competition between drivers.
